Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Enacts the Good Jobs Guarantee Act for workforce training
Summary: Enacts the good jobs guarantee program to provide workforce training and opportunities for employment for residents of New York state to secure high paying jobs through the acquisition of job skills.
LawCode: Add Art 28 §§500 - 504, Ec Dev L; add §60, UDC Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to enacting the good jobs guarantee act
